com.isotrol.impe3.core
Interface OfflineEngine

All Superinterfaces:
Engine
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultOfflineEngine
public interface OfflineEngine
extends Engine

Interface for a running offline engine. Implementations of this interface may be created per request.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez
